https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/utzWU4uM648hvheo0KymCKCltV3.jpg Brothers in War recounts the harrowing combat experiences of the men of Charlie Company - one of the last American combat infantry companies to be drafted, trained and sent to fight together in Vietnam. Brothers in War
